alert.note: Alert for Northern La Porte; Southern La Porte (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 16 at 9:35PM EST until February 17 at 7:00AM EST by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a glaze. Winds gusting as high as 30 mph. * WHERE...Northern La Porte and Southern La Porte Counties. * WHEN...Until 6 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Behind this area of precipitation tonight, lake effect snow is expected on Friday. Additional accumulations around an inch are expected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Northern La Porte; Southern La Porte
